'''1.20.6''' is a minor hotfix update to {{JE}} released on April 29, 2024,<ref name=release>{{mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-20-6|Minecraft Java Edition 1.20.6|April 29, 2024}}</ref> which fixes a data loss bug to do with [[trader llama]]s. It is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.20.5|1.20.5]] servers.
